name: Small World Escape Room in VR
name_original: Small World Escape Room in VR
description:
Small World Escape Room in VR. 

The player can change the size and use this ability to solve a sequence of clues and wind a star.

#VRJam2021

Circuit Stream Team Victor Fernandez, Misha Samorodin, Cara Sterling, Abraham Trevino, Isiaq Gbadamosi
